<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataBW extends data { const CODE = 'BW'; const PREFIX = 267; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '90\d{5}|(?:[2-6]|7\d)\d{6}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2(?:4[0-48]|6[0-24]|9[0578])|3(?:1[0-35-9]|55|[69]\d|7[013])|4(?:6[03]|7[1267]|9[0-5])|5(?:3[0389]|4[0489]|7[1-47]|88|9[0-49])|6(?:2[1-35]|5[149]|8[067]))\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '77200\d{3}|7(?:[1-6]\d|7[014-8])\d{5}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '90\d{5}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '79(?:1(?:[01]\d|20)|2[0-2]\d)\d{3}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{5})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
